messages.noPermission: &cYou do not have permission to use this kit!
messages.inCooldown: &cYou must wait before claiming this kit again!
messages.notEnoughMoney: &cYou do not have enough money to claim this kit! Cost: &6%cost%
messages.kitMaxClaimsReached: &cYou have reached the maximum number of claims (&6%max%&c) for the kit: &6%kit%!
messages.kitCooldownReset: &aCooldown for kit &6%kit% &ahas been reset for player &6%player%&a!
messages.inventoryFull: &cYour inventory is full! Make some space before claiming this kit.
messages.kitBlockUnset: &aYou've unlinked the kit from the block (&7%x% %y% %z%&a).
messages.kitBlockLookAtBlock: &cLook at a block within 6 blocks to use this command!
